name: 2022 10th International Conference on Environment Pollution and Prevention
content: Paper Publishing: ICEPP 2022 papers after the peer reviewing process by at least 2-3 experts, all the accepted papers will be published into Springer Book Series Environmental Science and Engineering (ISSN: 1863-5520), which will be submitted to EI Compendex, Scopus, SCImago and other major databases for indexing.
